name: KAFOO: The Root of Corruption
description:
KAFOO: The Root of Corruption

  Made In Global Game Jam 2023

  • 2D
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Casual
  • Windows
Story

In the modern world, Foo, the president of Tropical Land (former military leader) rules the Forest ofTropical Land which is filled with corruption.Fanafhon is an activist who wants to see the end of corruption or at least, diminish it. Many attempts have been tried but alas, all have failed. The desperate Fanafhon fell into despair and make his final wish to the Tree of Democracy.Miraculously, the tree granted his wish and so he traveled back in time before the coup happened.Fanafhon only has this one chance to stop Foo before he rose to power. It’s either he or Foo that will succeed in this fight!

Game Concept

The game is focused on the main character “Fanafhon”  who traveled back in time to stop “Foo”  the military leader who led the coup d’état which is the root of most corruption. The game is a local multiplayer game where one player plays as Fanafhon and another play as Foo. Both will compete against each other in multiple minigames to win as many points as possible. In the end, whoever has the most points will win the game.
